duties_responsibilities.duty: Participate in a 10-12 week Operations summer internship program at the Jonesboro processing plant.
Get hands-on experiences and developmental training in various areas of Operations.
Build affiliation with associate peers and interact with senior leadership.

education_certification.credential: Undergraduate in junior year pursuing degrees in Agri-Business, Animal Science, Food Science, Meat Science, Ag Leadership, Business, Supply Chain, or related field.
Demonstrated participation in extracurricular activities with leadership roles preferred.
Previous work experience of any kind preferred.
Valid driver's license and reliable transportation.
